modName: NPC Protection Tweaks - Essential - Protected - Invulnerable
summary: Tweak the Essentilal (Non-Killable, Immortal), Protected and Invulnerable properties of any NPC without breaking an immersion
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow]SKSE FREE
Compatible with everything
No messing up with the console
No so-called[/color] [color=red]"configuration spells"[/color][/b]

Simple mod that allows you to change the protection state of any NPC you select without immersion breaking By changing i mean: [b]ENABLE[/b] or [b]DISABLE[/b] !

1) Equip the Amulet of Arkay
2) Activate the NPC (the ability to tweak will go away in 30 seconds)

3) The menu will appear. Toggle the following options (each option can be enabled or disabled):
[b][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Essential_Characters_(Skyrim)]Essential[/url][/b] - Immortal, Non-Killable
[b][url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Protected_NPCs]Protected[/url][/b] - Enemies won't attack the NPC when health is low. The actor still can die from other factors
[b]Invulnerable[/b] - Takes no damage (Children style)

Obviously, mod makes no changes in the data files. Only savegame is affected.

Note: Sometimes active quests may prevent the option from being changed (via Aliases). You can change it later when the quest is completed.
author: flexcreator
